question:
Which of the following have been included under the “Prime Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana” (PMKSY)?
  1. Accelerated Irrigation Benefit Programme (AIBP)
  2. Integrated Watershed Management Programme (IWMP)
  3. On-Farm Water Management (OFWM)
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY) has been conceived by including the ongoing schemes viz. Accelerated Irrigation Benefit Programme (AIBP), Integrated Watershed Management Programme (IWMP) and On-Farm Water Management (OFWM). The programme is being supervised and monitored at the national level by an Inter-Ministerial National Steering Committee (NSC) under the Chairmanship of the Prime Minister with Union Ministers of all concerned Ministries. The programme has adopted a decentralised planning for the execution of the irrigation development plans based on district irrigation plans and state level irrigation plans.
